  • Constructor Details

    • Manager

      Manager()
      Creates initial Manager GUI view with panels for inventory, menu, and reports. Initializes panel and back buttons, default view is the inventory table. Also adds event listeners for any buttons on the default panel view.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Calls functions based on which button is pressed by the user. Overrides the actionPerformed method from the interface ActionListener.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - the action performed by the user

    • inventoryPanel

      private JPanel inventoryPanel()
      Creates GUI view for the Manager to view inventory data and edit inventory records.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing the inventory data with editing capabilities

    • menuPanel

      private JPanel menuPanel()
      Creates GUI view for the Manager to view the store's full menu and add items to it.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing data from SQL menu items table with editing capabilities

    • trendsPanel

      private JPanel trendsPanel()
      Creates GUI view for the Manager to choose whether to view sales data or the excess report, and set a time interval for which to view this data.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing interface to set dates and choose to view either sales or excess reports

    • restockPanel

      private JPanel restockPanel()
      Cereates GUI for Manager to view inventory items that need to be restocked, i.e. items of which less that 10% of the original stock remain
      Returns:
      a JPanel for the interface to view inventory restock needs

    • controlPanel

      private JPanel controlPanel()
      This function creates the default view for the Manager GUI that is active upon logging into the GUI as the Manager. Essentially an empty JPanel with only the button toolbar showing.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing the default view for the Manager GUI

    • tableChanged

      public void tableChanged(TableModelEvent e)
      This function overrides the tableChange function from TableModelListener. Detects data changes in a JTable and updates the corresponding SQL table.
      Specified by:
      tableChanged in interface TableModelListener
      Parameters:
      e - the event triggering the listener
